Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only embodies innovation but also offers unparalleled performance and durability. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $12000. Considering its immense value, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at this remarkable price. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business, enhancing efficiency and productivity. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
